description: Typically, when you transition into middle school, the first thing to go is your ability to stay organized. The result is a cluttered locker, a backpack bursting at the seams with too many books and crushed and folded papers, and an empty assignment notebook. In this course, you will learn proven strategies for using an assignment notebook effectively and staying organized at school and at home. The course should only take you about 2 hours to complete, that's great news! Are you ready to see your grades improve, let your your stress subside, and get your life in control? All good reasons to take our Academic Organization class today!
title: Academic Organization
